person.persName: Christopher Columbus Huffaker (Wayne County, Kentucky, farm laborer, farmer, soldier (USA))

body.p: Wayne County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier (U.S.A.). Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Huffaker and Mary M. Huffaker. Resident of Wayne County in 1850. Farm laborer in Wayne County in 1860. Farmer in Wayne County in 1863. Served in the 30th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as a sergeant from April 5, 1864 to April 18, 1865.
